attributes.action: Emile Heskey as Football Association chairman
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE PLEASE VOTE HESKEY AS FA CHAIRMAN

Emile heskey is one of the biggest influences in English football and has been for so many years. He is one of the best strikers scoring several goals for his situated team.
Heskey was born in Leicester, Leicestershire to a family of Antiguan descent, and his father, Tyrone Heskey, ran the security of nightclubs in Leicester. He was a keen footballer in his childhood and began playing for Ratby Groby Juniors, a local youth team in Leicester.

He played for the English national team for around 16 years and has been a incredible lever to English football. As the FA chairman, Emile Heskey will certainly play great effect to English football he will bring many footballing tournaments here to on of the biggest footballing countries in the world.

PLEASE PLEASE VOTE HESKEY AS FA CHAIRMAN.

rejection.details: This is a metter for the FA
